projectGridLines.stationName: House of Vaaree Pvt Ltd - Non Tech
projectGridLines.title: Category
projectGridLines.description:
Description: As a category intern, you'll dive into market trends, analyze product

performance, and collaborate on strategic initiatives to optimize our offerings and

drive sales growth.

Skill sets: Basic excel skills and studied business management at graduation or

Post graduate level.

Traits expectation: Analytical, attention to detail and collaborate with cross

functional teams.

Expected learning: As a category intern you will understand levers to improve

revenue of the website including optimizing product assortment, pricing strategies,

promotional tactics, and enhancing the overall user experience to boost sales and

maximize revenue potential.

projectGridLines.stationName: House of Vaaree Pvt Ltd - Non Tech
projectGridLines.title: APM
projectGridLines.description:
Description: As a Product Manager at Vaaree, you'll play an important role in driving

the evolution of our Website and App. You'll be spearheading the development and

execution of innovative strategies to enhance user experience, expand our product

offerings, and ultimately, make a meaningful impact on people's lives.

Skill sets: Excel, Analytical skills, knowledge of market research

Traits expectation: Time management, multi-tasking, strong communication skills

Expected learning: Campion user-centric approach to product development, agile

project management, stakeholder communication, performance anlysis

projectGridLines.stationName: House of Vaaree Pvt Ltd - Non Tech
projectGridLines.title: Business Analyst
projectGridLines.description:
Description: As an analytics intern, you will leverage data to drive improvements

across all functions of our Vaaree platform.

Skill sets: Sql, Any BI tool and python good to have.

Traits expectation: Curious, Problem Solver, Good Communication.

Expected learning: Working with BI tools, Deriving insights, owning metric and

working towards improvement.
